root: ^The Containment Chamber appears to be in ruin.
^Issue Detected: Faulty wiring caused a circuit malfunction.
^Leading to the tempered glass being de-electrified.
^Do you wish to attempt to repair the circuit.
^This may assist in the future capture and contaiment of the creature.

c-0: ^ Preparing for the future is always the best approach.
^DAVID: The fault originated from the panel located on the West hand wall.
^Recomendation: Divert power from lighting fixtures to jumpstart containment procedures
c-1: ^ I've got to get out of here as fast as possible.
^I don't want to stick around for when it comes back.
